verses.verse: כִּ֣י <WH3588> there לֹ֣א <WH3808> will be no מוּעָף֮ <WH4155> Nevertheless the dimness לַאֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> her who מוּצָ֣ק <WH4164> [shall] not [be] such as [was] in her vexation לָהּ֒ כָּעֵ֣ת <WH6256> when הָרִאשׁ֗וֹן <WH7223> at the first הֵקַ֞ל <WH7043> he lightly afflicted אַ֤רְצָה <WH776> the land זְבֻלוּן֙ <WH2074> of Zebulun וְאַ֣רְצָה <WH776> and the land נַפְתָּלִ֔י <WH5321> of Naphtali וְהָאַחֲר֖וֹן <WH314> and afterward הִכְבִּ֑יד <WH3513> did more grievously afflict דֶּ֤רֶךְ <WH1870> [her by] the way הַיָּם֙ <WH3220> of the sea עֵ֣בֶר <WH5676> beyond הַיַּרְדֵּ֔ן <WH3383> Jordan גְּלִ֖יל <WH1551> in Galilee הַגּוֹיִֽם׃ <WH1471> of the nations

הָעָם֙ <WH5971> The people הַהֹלְכִ֣ים <WH1980> that walked בַּחֹ֔שֶׁךְ <WH2822> in darkness רָא֖וּ <WH7200> have seen א֣וֹר <WH216> light גָּד֑וֹל <WH1419> a great יֹשְׁבֵי֙ <WH3427> they that dwell בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> in the land צַלְמָ֔וֶת <WH6757> of the shadow of death א֖וֹר <WH216> upon them hath the light נָגַ֥הּ <WH5050> shined עֲלֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH5921> and

הִרְבִּ֣יתָ <WH7235> Thou hast multiplied הַגּ֔וֹי <WH1471> the nation [לֹא כ] (לֹ֖ו <WH3808> not ק) הִגְדַּ֣לְתָּ <WH1431> [and] not increased הַשִּׂמְחָ֑ה <WH8057> the joy שָׂמְח֤וּ <WH8055> they joy לְפָנֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH6440> before כְּשִׂמְחַ֣ת <WH8057> thee according to the joy בַּקָּצִ֔יר <WH7105> in harvest כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> men יָגִ֖ילוּ <WH1523> [and] as [men] rejoice בְּחַלְּקָ֥ם <WH2505> when they divide שָׁלָֽל׃ <WH7998> the spoil

כִּ֣י ׀ <WH3588> for אֶת־ <WH853> עֹ֣ל <WH5923> the yoke סֻבֳּל֗וֹ <WH5448> of his burden וְאֵת֙ <WH853> מַטֵּ֣ה <WH4294> and the staff שִׁכְמ֔וֹ <WH7926> of his shoulder שֵׁ֖בֶט <WH7626> the rod הַנֹּגֵ֣שׂ <WH5065> of his oppressor בּ֑וֹ הַחִתֹּ֖תָ <WH2865> For thou hast broken כְּי֥וֹם <WH3117> as in the day מִדְיָֽן׃ <WH4080> of Midian

כִּ֤י <WH3588> For כָל־ <WH3605> every סְאוֹן֙ <WH5430> For every battle סֹאֵ֣ן <WH5431> of the warrior בְּרַ֔עַשׁ <WH7494> [is] with confused noise וְשִׂמְלָ֖ה <WH8071> and garments מְגוֹלָלָ֣ה <WH1556> rolled בְדָמִ֑ים <WH1818> in blood וְהָיְתָ֥ה <WH1961> will be for לִשְׂרֵפָ֖ה <WH8316> but [this] shall be with burning מַאֲכֹ֥לֶת <WH3980> [and] fuel אֵֽשׁ׃ <WH784> of fire

כִּי־ <WH3588> For יֶ֣לֶד <WH3206> For unto us a child יֻלַּד־ <WH3205> is born לָ֗נוּ בֵּ֚ן <WH1121> unto us a son נִתַּן־ <WH5414> is given לָ֔נוּ וַתְּהִ֥י <WH1961> will rest הַמִּשְׂרָ֖ה <WH4951> and the government עַל־ <WH5921> on שִׁכְמ֑וֹ <WH7926> shall be upon his shoulder וַיִּקְרָ֨א <WH7121> shall be called שְׁמ֜וֹ <WH8034> and his name פֶּ֠לֶא <WH6382> Wonderful יוֹעֵץ֙ <WH3289> Counsellor אֵ֣ל <WH410> God גִּבּ֔וֹר <WH1368> The mighty אֲבִיעַ֖ד <WH5703> The everlasting שַׂר־ <WH8269> The Prince שָׁלֽוֹם׃ <WH7965> of Peace

[לְמַרְבֵּה כ] (לְמַרְבֵּ֨ה <WH4766> great ק) הַמִּשְׂרָ֜ה <WH4951> of [his] government וּלְשָׁל֣וֹם <WH7965> and peace אֵֽין־ <WH369> There קֵ֗ץ <WH7093> [there shall be] no end עַל־ <WH5921> and over כִּסֵּ֤א <WH3678> upon the throne דָוִד֙ <WH1732> of David וְעַל־ <WH5921> and over מַמְלַכְתּ֔וֹ <WH4467> and upon his kingdom לְהָכִ֤ין <WH3559> to order אֹתָהּ֙ <WH853> וּֽלְסַעֲדָ֔הּ <WH5582> it and to establish בְּמִשְׁפָּ֖ט <WH4941> it with judgment וּבִצְדָקָ֑ה <WH6666> and with justice מֵעַתָּה֙ <WH6258> then וְעַד־ <WH5704> from henceforth even for עוֹלָ֔ם <WH5769> ever קִנְאַ֛ת <WH7068> The zeal יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> of the LORD צְבָא֖וֹת <WH6635> of hosts תַּעֲשֶׂה־ <WH6213> will perform זֹּֽאת׃ <WH2063> likewise ס
דָּבָ֛ר <WH1697> a word שָׁלַ֥ח <WH7971> sent אֲדֹנָ֖י <WH136> The Lord בְּיַעֲקֹ֑ב <WH3290> into Jacob וְנָפַ֖ל <WH5307> and it hath lighted בְּיִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> upon Israel

וְיָדְעוּ֙ <WH3045> shall know הָעָ֣ם <WH5971> And all the people כֻּלּ֔וֹ <WH3605> and all אֶפְרַ֖יִם <WH669> [even] Ephraim וְיוֹשֵׁ֣ב <WH3427> and the inhabitant שֹׁמְר֑וֹן <WH8111> of Samaria בְּגַאֲוָ֛ה <WH1346> in the pride וּבְגֹ֥דֶל <WH1433> and stoutness לֵבָ֖ב <WH3824> of heart לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> that say

לְבֵנִ֥ים <WH3843> The bricks נָפָ֖לוּ <WH5307> are fallen down וְגָזִ֣ית <WH1496> with hewn stones נִבְנֶ֑ה <WH1129> but we will build שִׁקְמִ֣ים <WH8256> the sycomores גֻּדָּ֔עוּ <WH1438> are cut down וַאֲרָזִ֖ים <WH730> [them into] cedars נַחֲלִֽיף׃ <WH2498> but we will change

וַיְשַׂגֵּ֧ב <WH7682> shall set up יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> Therefore the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> צָרֵ֥י <WH6862> the adversaries רְצִ֖ין <WH7526> of Rezin עָלָ֑יו <WH5921> against וְאֶת־ <WH853> אֹיְבָ֖יו <WH341> his enemies יְסַכְסֵֽךְ׃ <WH5526> together

אֲרָ֣ם <WH758> The Syrians מִקֶּ֗דֶם <WH6924> before וּפְלִשְׁתִּים֙ <WH6430> and the Philistines מֵֽאָח֔וֹר <WH268> behind וַיֹּאכְל֥וּ <WH398> and they shall devour אֶת־ <WH853> יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> Israel בְּכָל־ <WH3605> gaping פֶּ֑ה <WH6310> with open mouth בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all זֹאת֙ <WH2063> likewise לֹא־ <WH3808> does not שָׁ֣ב <WH7725> is not turned away אַפּ֔וֹ <WH639> For all this his anger וְע֖וֹד <WH5750> is still יָד֥וֹ <WH3027> but his hand נְטוּיָֽה׃ <WH5186> [is] stretched out still

וְהָעָ֥ם <WH5971> For the people לֹא־ <WH3808> Nor שָׁ֖ב <WH7725> turneth עַד־ <WH5704> who הַמַּכֵּ֑הוּ <WH5221> not unto him that smiteth וְאֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָא֖וֹת <WH6635> of hosts לֹ֥א <WH3808> Nor דָרָֽשׁוּ׃ <WH1875> them neither do they seek ס

וַיַּכְרֵ֨ת <WH3772> will cut off יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> Therefore the LORD מִיִּשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> from Israel רֹ֧אשׁ <WH7218> head וְזָנָ֛ב <WH2180> and tail כִּפָּ֥ה <WH3712> branch וְאַגְמ֖וֹן <WH100> and rush י֥וֹם <WH3117> day אֶחָֽד׃ <WH259> in one

זָקֵ֥ן <WH2205> The ancient וּנְשׂוּא־ <WH5375> accept פָנִ֖ים <WH6440> accept ה֣וּא <WH1931> he הָרֹ֑אשׁ <WH7218> [is] the head וְנָבִ֥יא <WH5030> and the prophet מֽוֹרֶה־ <WH3384> that teacheth שֶּׁ֖קֶר <WH8267> lies ה֥וּא <WH1931> he הַזָּנָֽב׃ <WH2180> he [is] the tail

וַיִּֽהְי֛וּ <WH1961> become מְאַשְּׁרֵ֥י <WH833> For the leaders הָֽעָם־ <WH5971> of this people הַזֶּ֖ה <WH2088> this מַתְעִ֑ים <WH8582> cause [them] to err וּמְאֻשָּׁרָ֖יו <WH833> and [they that are] led מְבֻלָּעִֽים׃ <WH1104> of them [are] destroyed

עַל־ <WH5921> and כֵּ֨ן <WH3651> after that עַל־ <WH5921> in בַּחוּרָ֜יו <WH970> in their young men לֹֽא־ <WH3808> Nor יִשְׂמַ֣ח ׀ <WH8055> shall have no joy אֲדֹנָ֗י <WH136> Therefore the Lord וְאֶת־ <WH853> יְתֹמָ֤יו <WH3490> on their fatherless וְאֶת־ <WH853> אַלְמְנֹתָיו֙ <WH490> and widows לֹ֣א <WH3808> Nor יְרַחֵ֔ם <WH7355> neither shall have mercy כִּ֤י <WH3588> For כֻלּוֹ֙ <WH3605> every חָנֵ֣ף <WH2611> for every one [is] an hypocrite וּמֵרַ֔ע <WH7489> and an evildoer וְכָל־ <WH3605> one פֶּ֖ה <WH6310> and every mouth דֹּבֵ֣ר <WH1696> speaketh נְבָלָ֑ה <WH5039> folly בְּכָל־ <WH3605> and every זֹאת֙ <WH2063> likewise לֹא־ <WH3808> Nor שָׁ֣ב <WH7725> is not turned away אַפּ֔וֹ <WH639> For all this his anger וְע֖וֹד <WH5750> is still יָד֥וֹ <WH3027> but his hand נְטוּיָֽה׃ <WH5186> [is] stretched out still

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for בָעֲרָ֤ה <WH1197> burneth כָאֵשׁ֙ <WH784> as the fire רִשְׁעָ֔ה <WH7564> For wickedness שָׁמִ֥יר <WH8068> the briers וָשַׁ֖יִת <WH7898> and thorns תֹּאכֵ֑ל <WH398> it shall devour וַתִּצַּת֙ <WH3341> and shall kindle בְּסִֽבְכֵ֣י <WH5442> in the thickets הַיַּ֔עַר <WH3293> of the forest וַיִּֽתְאַבְּכ֖וּ <WH55> and they shall mount up גֵּא֥וּת <WH1348> [like] the lifting up עָשָֽׁן׃ <WH6227> of smoke

בְּעֶבְרַ֛ת <WH5678> Through the wrath יְהוָ֥ה <WH3069> God צְבָא֖וֹת <WH6635> of hosts נֶעְתַּ֣ם <WH6272> darkened אָ֑רֶץ <WH776> is the land וַיְהִ֤י <WH1961> become הָעָם֙ <WH5971> and the people כְּמַאֲכֹ֣לֶת <WH3980> shall be as the fuel אֵ֔שׁ <WH784> of the fire אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> no man אֶל־ <WH413> about אָחִ֖יו <WH251> his brother לֹ֥א <WH3808> No יַחְמֹֽלוּ׃ <WH2550> shall spare

וַיִּגְזֹ֤ר <WH1504> And he shall snatch עַל־ <WH5921> on יָמִין֙ <WH3225> on the right hand וְרָעֵ֔ב <WH7456> but are hungry וַיֹּ֥אכַל <WH398> and he shall eat עַל־ <WH5921> on שְׂמֹ֖אול <WH8040> on the left hand וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> are not שָׂבֵ֑עוּ <WH7646> and they shall not be satisfied אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> every man בְּשַׂר־ <WH1320> the flesh זְרֹע֖וֹ <WH2220> of his own arm יֹאכֵֽלוּ׃ <WH398> they shall eat

מְנַשֶּׁ֣ה <WH4519> Manasseh אֶת־ <WH853> אֶפְרַ֗יִם <WH669> Ephraim וְאֶפְרַ֙יִם֙ <WH669> and Ephraim אֶת־ <WH853> מְנַשֶּׁ֔ה <WH4519> Manasseh יַחְדָּ֥ו <WH3162> [and] they together הֵ֖מָּה <WH1992> they עַל־ <WH5921> are against יְהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> [shall be] against Judah בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all זֹאת֙ <WH2063> likewise לֹא־ <WH3808> does not שָׁ֣ב <WH7725> is not turned away אַפּ֔וֹ <WH639> For all this his anger וְע֖וֹד <WH5750> is still יָד֥וֹ <WH3027> but his hand נְטוּיָֽה׃ <WH5186> [is] stretched out still ס
